verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> she-Ta-yim In the second לְדָרְיָ֣וֶשׁ <WH1867> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, the king בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi, in the sixth בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; of the month הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by חַגַּ֣י <WH2292> chag-Gai Haggai הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi, the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to זְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel unto Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <WH7597> she-'al-ti-'El of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <WH6346> pa-Chat governor יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' and to Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָ֛ק <WH3087> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol the high לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> ha-'Am This people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh This אָֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru, say לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not עֶת־ <WH6256> 'et- The time בֹּ֛א <WH935> bo is not come עֶת־ <WH6256> 'et- the time בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD'S לְהִבָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> le-hib-ba-Not. should be built פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by חַגַּ֥י <WH2292> chag-Gai Haggai הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

הַעֵ֤ת <WH6256> ha-'Et [Is it] time לָכֶם֙ la-Chem אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> 'at-Tem, you לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet for you O ye to dwell בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֣ם <WH1004> be-vat-tei-Chem houses סְפוּנִ֑ים <WH5603> se-fu-Nim; in your cieled וְהַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> ve-hab-Ba-yit and this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this חָרֵֽב׃ <WH2720> cha-Rev. desolate

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> Si-mu appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem heart עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> dar-chei-Chem. your ways

זְרַעְתֶּ֨ם <WH2232> ze-ra'-Tem Ye have sown הַרְבֵּ֜ה <WH7235> har-Beh much וְהָבֵ֣א <WH935> ve-ha-Ve and bring מְעָ֗ט <WH4592> me-'At, in little אָכ֤וֹל <WH398> a-Chol ye eat וְאֵין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- no לְשָׂבְעָה֙ <WH7654> le-sa-ve-'Ah but ye have not enough שָׁת֣וֹ <WH8354> sha-To ye drink וְאֵין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- one לְשָׁכְרָ֔ה <WH7937> le-sha-che-Rah, but ye are not filled with drink לָב֖וֹשׁ <WH3847> la-Voosh ye clothe וְאֵין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- one לְחֹ֣ם <WH2527> le-Chom you but there is none warm ל֑וֹ lo; וְהַ֨מִּשְׂתַּכֵּ֔ר <WH7936> ve-Ham-mis-tak-Ker, and he that earneth wages מִשְׂתַּכֵּ֖ר <WH7936> mis-tak-Ker earneth wages אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into צְר֥וֹר <WH6872> tze-Ror [to put it] into a bag נָקֽוּב׃ <WH5344> na-Kuv. with holes פ Peh

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> Si-mu appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem heart עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> dar-chei-Chem. your ways

עֲל֥וּ <WH5927> 'a-Lu Go up הָהָ֛ר <WH2022> ha-Har to the mountain וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> va-ha-ve-Tem and bring עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> 'etz wood וּבְנ֣וּ <WH1129> u-ve-Nu and build הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; the house וְאֶרְצֶה־ <WH7521> ve-'er-tzeh- and I will take pleasure בּ֥וֹ bo ; וְאֶכָּבֵד ve-'ek-ka-ved כוְאֶכָּבְדָ֖ה <WH3513> ve-'ek-ka-ve-Dah abounding with קאָמַ֥ר <WH559> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

פָּנֹ֤ה <WH6437> pa-Noh Ye looked אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַרְבֵּה֙ <WH7235> har-Beh for much וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold לִמְעָ֔ט <WH4592> lim-'At, and lo [it came] to little וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> va-ha-ve-Tem and when ye brought הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit [it] home וְנָפַ֣חְתִּי <WH5301> ve-na-Fach-ti I did blow ב֑וֹ vo; יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because מֶ֗ה <WH4100> Meh, Why נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> ne-'Um upon it Why;saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, Because בֵּיתִי֙ <WH1004> bei-Ti of mine house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he חָרֵ֔ב <WH2720> cha-Rev, that [is] waste וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem of you רָצִ֖ים <WH7323> ra-Tzim and ye run אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> le-vei-To. unto his own house

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken after that עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, because כָּלְא֥וּ <WH3607> kal-'U over you is stayed שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim Therefore the heaven מִטָּ֑ל <WH2919> mit-Tal; from dew וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz and the earth כָּלְאָ֥ה <WH3607> kal-'Ah is stayed יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH2981> ye-vu-Lah. [from] her fruit

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <WH7121> va-'ek-Ra And I called חֹ֜רֶב <WH2721> Cho-rev for a drought עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz upon the land וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הֶהָרִ֗ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim, and upon the mountains וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הַדָּגָן֙ <WH1715> had-da-Gan and upon the corn וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> hat-ti-Roosh and upon the new wine וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הַיִּצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> hai-yitz-Har, and upon the oil וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> ve-'Al on אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what תּוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> to-Tzi bringeth forth הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah; and upon [that] which the ground וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> ha-'a-Dam and upon men וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> hab-be-he-Mah, and upon cattle וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and on כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְגִ֥יעַ <WH3018> ye-Gi-a' and upon all the labour כַּפָּֽיִם׃ <WH3709> kap-Pa-yim. of the hands ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' obeyed זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל׀ <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel Then Zerubbabel בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֡ל <WH7597> shal-ti-'El of Shealtiel וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָק֩ <WH3087> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol the high וְכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> ve-Chol all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit with all the remnant הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of the people בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> be-kOl the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem, their God וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> div-Rei and the words חַגַּ֣י <WH2292> chag-Gai of Haggai הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi, the prophet כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after שְׁלָח֖וֹ <WH7971> she-la-Cho had sent יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God וַיִּֽירְא֥וּ <WH3372> vai-yi-re-'U did fear הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am him and the people מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> Vai-yo-mer Then spake חַגַּ֞י <WH2292> chag-Gai Haggai מַלְאַ֧ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach messenger יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD'S בְּמַלְאֲכ֥וּת <WH4400> be-mal-'a-Chut message יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh in the LORD'S לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> la-'Am unto the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem for נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- I [am] with you saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיָּ֣עַר <WH5782> vai-Ya-'ar stirred up יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רוּחַ֩ <WH7307> ru-aCh the spirit זְרֻבָּבֶ֨ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel of Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֜ל <WH7597> shal-ti-'El of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <WH6346> pa-Chat governor יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> Ru-ach and the spirit יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' of Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָק֙ <WH3087> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol, the high וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach, and the spirit כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol of all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit of all the remnant הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; of the people וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su and did מְלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> me-la-Chah, work בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> be-veit- in the house יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God פ Peh

בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah In the four לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month בַּשִּׁשִּׁ֑י <WH8345> bash-shish-Shi; of the sixth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> she-Ta-yim in the second לְדָרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1867> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. the king
